name: Real Al's Humanity Academy
description: Real Al’s Humanity Academy combines wacky minigame action, a bizarre sense of humor, and the world’s most human robot to give you a VR party game unlike any other. There’s never been a better time to learn how to be human. Enroll today!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 310 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better Storage: 310 MB available space
